name: 2021 6th International Conference on Multimedia Systems and Signal Processing（ICMSSP 2021）
content: Publication： Accepted papers will be included into the ICMSSP 2021 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9037-8), and archived in the ACM Online Digital Library. The proceedings will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
